properties.title: AEOLUS+INNOVATION - NEWTON
properties.description: Demonstrate the potential improvement of short-term dust forecasts when the numerical simulations are initialized from meteorological fields in which Aeolus observations have been assimilated.
properties.osc:name: AEOLUS+ INNOVATION - EXPRO+ IMPROVING DUST MONITORING AND FORECASTING THROUGH AEOLUS WIND DATA ASSIMILATION (NEWTON)
